articles.author: Paige Gawley
articles.title: T.J. Holmes Had Years-Long Affair With a 'Good Morning America' Producer Before Amy Robach Romance - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: The romance lasted 'a few years,' a source tells ET.
articles.content:
T.J. Holmes is making news for another romance. Just days after news of Holmes' relationship with Amy Robach broke, ET has learned he had an affair with a Good Morning America producer. 
ET has also… [+2210 chars]
